无缝轮播

🍑大约 1 分钟
此页内容
  • 实现思路
  • 代码演示

无缝轮播

实现思路

例如有 3 张图，第 1 张前面额外添加第 3 张，第 3 张后面额外添加第 1 张，父元素设置负的left值（图片宽度 * 当前图片索引，也可以使用translateX来代替left实现这个效果）。当滚动到第 3 张后面的第 1 张时，修改left为第 1 张的left值，此过程不走动画。同理，当滚动到第 1 张前面的第 3 张时，修改left为第 3 张的left值，此过程不走动画。

代码演示

无缝轮播演示
<div id="container">
  <!-- banner -->
  <div id="banner"></div>

  <button id="pre">上一张</button>
  <button id="next">下一张</button>
</div>
const bannerElm = document.getElementById("banner");

const preElm = document.getElementById("pre");
const nextElm = document.getElementById("next");

let imgList = ["images/1.jpg", "images/2.jpg", "images/3.jpg"];
let timer = null;
let activeIndex = 0;

initImg();

// 初始化图片
function initImg() {
  activeIndex++;
  const first = imgList[0];
  const last = imgList[imgList.length - 1];
  imgList = [last, ...imgList, first];

  let imgElm = "";
  for (let i = 0; i < imgList.length; i++) {
    // imgElm += "<img class='img' src=" + imgList[i] + " />";
    imgElm += "<div class='img'>" + imgList[i] + "</div>";
  }

  bannerElm.innerHTML = imgElm;
  bannerElm.style.transform = `translateX(-${activeIndex * 100}%)`;

  // 自动轮播
  // startPlay();
}

preElm.onclick = moveImgLeft;
nextElm.onclick = moveImgRight;

// 自动轮播
function startPlay() {
  timer = setInterval(moveImgRight, 1000);
}

// 结束轮播
function finishPlay() {
  clearInterval(timer);
  timer = null;
}

// 向左移动 activeIndex--;
function moveImgLeft() {
  activeIndex--;
  bannerElm.style.transition = `all .5s ease`;
  bannerElm.style.transform = `translateX(-${activeIndex * 100}%)`;
  if (activeIndex === 0) {
    activeIndex = imgList.length - 2;
    setTimeout(function () {
      bannerElm.style.transition = "none";
      bannerElm.style.transform = `translateX(-${activeIndex * 100}%)`;
    }, 500);
  }
}

// 向右移动 activeIndex++;
function moveImgRight() {
  activeIndex++;
  bannerElm.style.transition = `all .5s ease`;
  bannerElm.style.transform = `translateX(-${activeIndex * 100}%)`;
  if (activeIndex === imgList.length - 1) {
    activeIndex = 1;
    setTimeout(function () {
      bannerElm.style.transition = "none";
      bannerElm.style.transform = `translateX(-${activeIndex * 100}%)`;
    }, 500);
  }
}
* {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  text-decoration: none;
}
#container {
  margin: auto;
  width: 500px;
  height: 400px;
  overflow: hidden;
  position: relative;
}

#banner {
  height: 100%;
  display: flex;
}

.img {
  flex-shrink: 0;
  width: 500px;
  height: 100%;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  background: white;
}

#pre,
#next {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  margin-top: -10px;
}

#pre {
  left: 0;
}

#next {
  right: 0;
}
